DOC.brief_summary: Immune system suppression effect Progesterone Induced Blocking Factor ( PIBF ) , could questionable whether tumor cell express PIBF escape immune system . There study literature evaluate PIBF expression different malign cell ( e.g . glioblastoma multiforme malign central nerve system , leukemia , astrocytoma primary brain tumor , lung cancer chorionic carcinoma ) . According previous study PIBF use anti-tumor immune suppressor tumor cell . There data PIBF expression endometrial tumor cell . Therefore , investigator aim determine PIBF expression level endometrial cancer cell .
DOC.brief_title: Progesterone Induced Blocking Factor Expression Levels Endometrial Cancer Cells .
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective control study conduct Obstetrics Gynecology clinic Pathology clinic Kayseri Training Research Hospital . This study conduct use formalin fix paraffin embed tissue block immunohistochemically determine PIBF expression level sample . There three group study ; endometrial cancer , endometrial hyperplasia normal endometrium group contain 20 paraffin embed block provide form Pathology clinic Kayseri Training Research Hospital archive .
DOC.criteria: diagnose endometrial cancer diagnose endometrial hyperplasia diagnose cancer except endometrial cancer
